title: Božidar Matić
text: Božidar Matić (; 8 September 1937 – 12 May 2016) was a Bosnian politician who was the president of the <a href="Academy%20of%20Sciences%20and%20Arts%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Academy of Sciences and Arts of Bosnia and Herzegovina</a> and a former <a href="Chairman%20of%20the%20Council%20of%20Ministers%20of%20Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Chairman of the Council of Ministers of Bosnia and Herzegovina</a> from 22 February 2001 until 18 July 2001. Additionally, he was the <a href="Ministry%20of%20Finance%20and%20Treasury%20%28Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina%29">Minister of Finance and Treasury</a> from 22 February 2001 until 17 July 2001.
